svg.title: Fragile Agent: Full System Architecture
svg.desc: Comprehensive architecture diagram showing Environment, Boundary Interface, Encoder/Shutter with Attentive Atlas, Ontology Expansion, Supervised Topology, Belief Filter, Metric/Dynamics stack, Effective Potential, World Model, Critic, Policy, Memory/Retrieval, Governor/Sieve diagnostics, and explicit latent spaces (Z, A, C, Theta) plus encoders/decoders.

g.text: Memory: {zt', at', rt'} for t' < t
Input: K, zn, V(z), nabla V
